job.title: Associate Veterinarian- Bay Cities Pet Hospital
job.description: Bay Cities Pet Hospital is looking to add a great associate veterinarian to their amazing team of professionals. We are a 3-doctor, small animal practice that specializes in providing high quality, compassionate and convenient care for our patients Our Facility: Bay Cities Pet Hospital is an established modern and well-equipped veterinary hospital, and boarding. We have digital x-ray and digital dental x-ray, modern ultrasounds, and an in-house lab. Our Package: Our benefits package includes an employer-sponsored 401(k) match, medical, dental, vision, employer-sponsored health savings account (HSA) match, flexible spending accounts, employer-sponsored life insurance, supplemental life and disability insurance, legal & identity theft plans, paid time off, paid parental leave, subsidized back up care & family care benefits, veterinary-specific employee assistance program, fertility/adoption/surrogacy support, and discounts, student loan education & refinancing, a very generous veterinary service discount for your pets, as well as continuing education and an annual discretionary fund. Our Home: Since 1958, Bay Cities Pet Hospital has provided quality animal care to the South Bay community. Today, we combine a legacy of experience with the latest technology in veterinary medicine to look after the four-footed members of your family. Bay Cities Pet Hospital operates an appointment-free walk-in full-service veterinary hospital with convenient hours seven days a week. At Bay Cities Pet Hospital, we take pride in providing the best in modern veterinary medical services coupled with the kind of old-fashioned compassion that seems to be going out of style in our industry these days. We conduct wellness exams for new puppies and kittens, routine checkups for old family friends; dental care, bathing, and vaccinations to keep your pets clean and healthy and diagnostic exams and surgeries in the unfortunate event that they're not. Job Requirements: Loyal, passionate about patient care and client communication. Offers excellent diagnostic abilities along with outstanding communication Dedicated and takes pride in your work, values collaboration, and is emotionally intelligent. Truly values patient care and has a strong ambition to grow and is overall enthusiastic about veterinary medicine. VIP Program: Veterinary Incentive Plan The industry-first program called the Veterinarian Incentive Plan allows current doctors and those who become a part of the Pathway team to elect to participate in the new bonus structure, which is based on tenure and company performance. General practice veterinarians can earn up to $225,000, One-third of the total VIP award is based on each doctor's tenure and the other two-thirds is based on company performance. The program is eligible for current and new doctors who provide veterinary care at Pathway veterinary hospital locations and includes general practice, specialty, and emergency doctors. This includes both part-time and full-time doctors. At Pathway, we celebrate and embrace the uniqueness and diversity of all of our team members, pet parents, and pets. We strive to create a diverse, equitable, and inclusive culture where all team members belong and feel empowered. Apply today! Come join our TEAM, we look forward to hearing from you! PI144939995
